crusadeAgendas.name: Assassinate
crusadeAgendas.description: Destroy a specific enemy CHARACTER unit.

crusadeAgendas.name: Linebreaker
crusadeAgendas.description: Have at least one model from this unit wholly within the enemy deployment zone at the end of the battle.

crusadeAgendas.name: Hold the Line
crusadeAgendas.description: Ensure no enemy units are within your own deployment zone at the end of the battle.
